song.title: Window of Opportunities
song.info:
Info from Soundcloud:
Hey people, I recently got some sweet melodies in my head. So I decided to put them to notes and hit record.
The outcome was this chip-disco track "Window of Opportunities" which has some adventurous crossovers. It was inspired by the new year - 2014, Sci-fi-channel UFO-documetaries and various C64-tunes.
The working name for this chiptune-ninja was something like "soup kitchen", but it grew into something more energetic and I threw in some more production as well.
Hope you enjoy this powered-up chiptune for all you bleepers in 2014! Cheers.
--------------------------------------------------- NOTE: Turn the volume down because of the song strate.. however, the file was big as heck.
